comment: /**  * The translating method. Takes an element from the input data set and transforms  * it into exactly one element.  *  * @param value input value.  * @param reuse value which may be reused for output. if reuse is null then a new output object  *              must be instantiated and returned  * @return the transformed value  *  * @throws Exception This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation  *                   to fail and may trigger recovery.  */
code: /**  * The translating method. Takes an element from the input data set and transforms  * it into exactly one element.  *  * @param value input value.  * @param reuse value which may be reused for output. if reuse is null then a new output object  *              must be instantiated and returned  * @return the transformed value  *  * @throws Exception This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation  *                   to fail and may trigger recovery.  */ O translate(T value, O reuse) throws Exception.
